cool ill seed it for the next 12 hrs to make sure you get it....then stop,you wouldnt believe but 20 ppl are downloading it already,despite the"dont bother"message,people are funny darn cattle huh...
im mainly lookin at gettin the wireless sorted out,your specs are no better/worse than my work lappy,so if it works ok ill go ahead and do a build with the complete driver pack(latest for win7)

Well, it took forever to download  .... but I finally got it and booted up. There was no network support installed and I could not use the device manager to see which devices were installed. ... besides that, it looked nice. Had browsers, but couldn't surf :-(

dammit,the drivers injected nicely,i checked em before i posted it,in the bottom left corner of ur desktop theres a quick launch shortcut for PENetwork(its the network manager for this system).(god please tell me i didnt forget to add it in the build!)if its there(ill boot my copy up in a min)open it and scan for devices:-)

yup,a great quality is to admit when you have made a mistake,in my haste to post this.....iv forgot to include PENetwork....(yes.....yes i feel stupid!)shit....as a tradeoff i tested the run again with it installed on a number of comps,as an apology,ill get version 4 out with the full driver pack requested...oh and btw?....it works great....wifi is here....and sorry,my bad...
